creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text:
This appears to be an issue for iWS from iPlanet.  Are you claiming that it also 
fails in Tomcat?

NOTE:  Testing with Tomcat 4 indicates that this pattern will work as expected, 
as long as the browser correctly forwards the session cookie it receives back to 
the server on the redirect.

Try to use String class... it works fine with your own classes, but not with 
String!
creator: ddon@fotki.com

text:
I did.  It works.  Both with beans (as in the report on iPlanet), and with 
strings, ***AS LONG AS*** the browser correctly forwards the cookie along with 
the redirect.

Please provide a test case the demonstrates the problem you are having with it, 
and reconfirm that you are reporting this problem against a particular version 
of Tomcat (the hyperlink you included is a bug report against iWS, not Tomcat).
creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
